skillTree.localised_description: The dominion of Chaos grows larger each day; soon the whole world will be under its sway.
This Lord belts out orders and can be heard even across a battlefield smothered in the grim noise of war.
I have many names, many titles… Harbinger, Dark Master, Lord of Shadows.
This willing servant of the Ruinous Powers has a resilience that is beyond any mortal measure.

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord

skillTree.localised_description: This world will end, the End Times are coming. I have crowned the last Everchosen.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases by each enemy unit in range with leadership wavering or lower.

skillTree.localised_description: Daemon-Whisperer, Puppet Master… but you, you may call me… a God.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord speaks with a dread booming voice - a gift from his Dark Masters to ensure obedience.
The followers of Chaos need not to rest, they march on with iron hearts desperate to harvest souls.
The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

skillTree.localised_description: The most malevolent powers of the Four are granted to their servants at the request of the Dark Master.

effects.description:
Hero recruit rank: +2 for Chaos Sorcerers
	(all provinces)

Winds of Magic cost: -10% for Lore of Shadows spells

Winds of Magic cost: -20% for Lore of Shadows spells

skillTree.localised_description: Be'lakor is given authority to work on behalf of the Chaos Gods in unified corruption!
Swift flashes of an agile form and razor-sharp blades are all this Daemon Lord's victims see of him, but by then it's already far, far too late.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

attributes.bullet_text: When attacking braced charge defenders, this unit only loses half of its charge bonus.

skillTree.localised_description: The caster weaves a confounding fog that numbs and deludes enemies, causing them to stumble and stagger.

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs 25 men unit or above
Strong vs 25 men unit or above

Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Melkoth's Mystifying Miasma Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: A conjured shadow is just as obfuscating as a real one - the Shadow Wizard is master or mistress of the 'concealing' arts.
When cast this spell enfeebles enemy minds; they feel the crushing weight of reality bearing down upon them.

skillTree.localised_description: The Wizard destroys their enemies from within, corroding foes' minds with doubt and crisis.

skillTree.localised_description: A spectral pendulum is summoned by the Wizard. On command, it swings, razor sharp and with lethal speed, through the foe.

skillTree.localised_description: The spellcaster opens a vortex leading into the Pit. Anything caught within it will be lost forever.

skillTree.localised_description: The supernatural solution is often the best; weapons materialise before the caster's allies, allowing them to slice through flesh, soul, and consciousness.

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve: +1 per turn
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: A Chaos Lord dominates – lesser beings cringe from a being that is so intently under scrutiny from the Dark Gods.

effects.description:

skillTree.localised_description: To the Northmen, there is no greater honour than to fight and perish under the gaze of the Gods.

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
"You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."

skillTree.localised_description: Battles can be lost, but can the war ever really be won? The advance of Ruin can never truly be halted once and for all.

skillTree.localised_description: The expression of surprise on an ambushed foe's face is always a particularly delectable treat.
"This stinking mortal Hold will fall, my masters have foreseen it. Bring them ruin!"

skillTree.localised_description: There is no stopping this one's slaughter, for they are driven by the unquenchable lust for battle.
Proficient with figures, this Lord, or his subordinates, can keep his army fulfilled, even in dire circumstances.
As they are a most adept and dedicated magic-user, where this one treads, the Winds always blow high and hard.

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

Daemonic units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is low.
	
	Daemonic units also have:
	Physical Resistance
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

factionEffects.localised_description: Be'lakor, a savage primitive from an unknown land, became the first mortal to pledge his soul to the Chaos Gods.

effects.description: Human Lords can be corrupted into becoming Daemon Princes when defeated in battle or targeted by Heroes
